name: Character's full name
description: Brief description or bio of the character
level: Character's level (usually a number between 1 and 20)
inspiration: Yes or No (whether the character has inspiration)
proficiency_bonus: Bonus added due to character's level (+2 to +6 typically)
alignment: Character's moral and ethical alignment (e.g., Lawful Good, Chaotic Neutral)
experience_points: Total experience points the character has earned
armor_class: Character's armor class (how hard they are to hit)
attacks_spellcasting: List of character's main attacks or spells, or N/A
languages: Languages the character can speak, read, and write
proficiencies: Skills and tools the character is proficient with
features_traits: Special abilities or features of the character
character_appearance: Detailed description of the character's appearance
allies_organizations: Allies, friends, and organizations the character is associated with
treasure: Valuable items or keepsakes the character possesses
spellcasting_ability: Primary ability for spellcasting (e.g., Intelligence, Wisdom, Charisma) or N/A
spell_save_dc: Difficulty class for others to resist character's spells, or N/A
spell_attack_bonus: Bonus added to character's spell attacks, or N/A
1_level_spells: List of character's 1st-level spells, or N/A
2_level_spells: List of character's 2nd-level spells, or N/A
3_level_spells: List of character's 3rd-level spells, or N/A
4_level_spells: List of character's 4th-level spells, or N/A
5_level_spells: List of character's 5th-level spells, or N/A
6_level_spells: List of character's 6th-level spells, or N/A
7_level_spells: List of character's 7th-level spells, or N/A
8_level_spells: List of character's 8th-level spells, or N/A
9_level_spells: List of character's 9th-level spells, or N/A
portrait_prompt: A description prompt for artists to visualize and draw the character

name: Merlin Ambrosius
description: A legendary wizard, Merlin is known for his wisdom, foresight, and mastery over the arcane arts. He served as the advisor to King Arthur and played a pivotal role in the Arthurian legends.
personality_traits: I'm patient, observant, and often speak in riddles.
ideals: Knowledge and wisdom above all else. The future can be shaped, but not controlled.
bonds: Dedicated to King Arthur and the Knights of the Round Table.
flaws: Sometimes too cryptic for his own good. Tends to isolate himself.
attacks_spellcasting: Staff of Power: +8 to hit, 1d6+3 bludgeoning damage, +10 Spell Attack Bonus
equipment: Staff of Power, Spellbook, Robes of the Archmagi, Crystal Ball
character_appearance: An elderly figure with a long white beard, Merlin is often seen in flowing robes adorned with arcane symbols. His piercing blue eyes seem to see through time itself.
allies_organizations: King Arthur, Knights of the Round Table, Lady of the Lake
character_backstory: Merlin's origins are shrouded in mystery. Some say he's a cambion, born of a mortal woman and a demon. He has been King Arthur's mentor and protector, guiding him since his youth and playing a crucial role in the rise and fall of Camelot.
treasure: Excalibur's scabbard, a gift from the Lady of the Lake
1_level_spells: Magic Missile, Mage Armor, Shield, Detect Magic
2_level_spells: Misty Step, Scorching Ray, Mirror Image, Arcane Lock
4_level_spells: Dimension Door, Arcane Eye, Stoneskin, Greater Invisibility
5_level_spells: Wall of Force, Telekinesis, Bigby's Hand, Rary's Telepathic Bond
6_level_spells: True Seeing, Contingency, Chain Lightning, Globe of Invulnerability
7_level_spells: Teleport, Plane Shift, Reverse Gravity, Simulacrum
9_level_spells: Wish, Time Stop, Foresight, Prismatic Wall
portrait_prompt: A wise and ancient wizard, Merlin Ambrosius stands with a staff glowing with arcane energy. His long white beard and robes of the Archmagi give him an air of profound wisdom and power.

name: Steven Universe
description: A young half-Gem, half-human boy, Steven has grown up in the shadow of the Crystal Gems. He's compassionate, optimistic, and has the unique ability to heal others with his tears or saliva.
personality_traits: I'm optimistic and always try to see the good in everyone. I believe in the power of love and friendship.
ideals: Everyone deserves a second chance. Understanding and empathy can solve most problems.
bonds: The Crystal Gems are my family, and I'll do anything to protect them and Earth.
flaws: I sometimes act without thinking and take on burdens that aren't mine to bear.
attacks_spellcasting: Shield Bash: +6 to hit, 1d6+2 bludgeoning damage.
features_traits: Gem Abilities, Healing Tears, Protective Bubble
character_appearance: Steven is a cheerful teenager with curly black hair. He often wears a star T-shirt and has a pink gem on his navel.
allies_organizations: Crystal Gems, Friends in Beach City
character_backstory: Steven grew up with the Crystal Gems, guardians of Earth. As he matured, he learned about his mother, Rose Quartz, and her legacy. He strives to live up to her ideals while carving out his own path.
treasure: Rose's Gem, a keepsake from his mother.
1_level_spells: Cure Wounds, Healing Word, Disguise Self, Charm Person
2_level_spells: Lesser Restoration, Calm Emotions, Enhance Ability, Hold Person
3_level_spells: Dispel Magic, Hypnotic Pattern, Major Image, Sending
4_level_spells: Dimension Door, Greater Invisibility, Freedom of Movement, Aura of Purity (from Additional Magical Secrets)
portrait_prompt: A cheerful teenager named Steven Universe with curly black hair, a star T-shirt, and a pink gem on his navel. He's holding a ukulele and has a radiant smile on his face.

name: Hootie
description: The sentient door knocker of The Owl House. Hootie is cheerful, eager to help, and often misunderstood by the house's residents. He's deeply loyal and has a penchant for giving unsolicited advice.
personality_traits: I'm eager to help and often overly enthusiastic. I deeply care for the residents of The Owl House.
ideals: Friendship. True friends stand by each other, no matter what.
bonds: The Owl House is my home, and its residents are my family.
flaws: I can be overly clingy and often don't recognize when I'm being annoying.
features_traits: Sentient Door Knocker, Stationary, Extendable Neck
character_appearance: Hootie is a bronze door knocker in the shape of an owl. He has large, expressive eyes and can extend his neck to great lengths.
allies_organizations: Luz, Eda, King, and other residents of The Owl House.
character_backstory: Hootie has always been a part of The Owl House. While his origins are a mystery, he is a steadfast guardian and friend to those who reside within.
treasure: A collection of small trinkets given to him by Luz and other residents.
1_level_spells: Bless, Cure Wounds, Guiding Bolt, Sanctuary, Detect Magic (Domain: Bless, Cure Wounds)
2_level_spells: Lesser Restoration, Prayer of Healing, Spiritual Weapon, Aid (Domain: Lesser Restoration, Spiritual Weapon)
3_level_spells: Mass Healing Word, Remove Curse, Dispel Magic, Beacon of Hope (Domain: Beacon of Hope, Revivify)
4_level_spells: Guardian of Faith, Death Ward, Divination (Domain: Death Ward, Guardian of Faith)
portrait_prompt: A sentient bronze door knocker in the shape of an owl named Hootie, with large expressive eyes and the ability to extend his neck.

name: Aaliyah Jones
description: A confident black woman who champions social justice. Aaliyah is a scholar by day and an activist by night, fighting for a world where everyone is treated equally.
personality_traits: I value knowledge and believe in the power of words and stories to bring change.
ideals: Equality. Every person, regardless of race, gender, or orientation, deserves respect and rights.
bonds: I will always stand up against injustice, and I cherish the community I've built.
flaws: I sometimes spread myself too thin trying to help everyone.
attacks_spellcasting: Light Crossbow: +5 to hit, 1d8+2 piercing damage.
equipment: Light Crossbow, Lute, Scholar's outfit, Notebook and quill
features_traits: Bardic Inspiration, Jack of All Trades, Song of Rest
character_appearance: Aaliyah is a confident black woman with a strong presence. She has curly black hair, usually tied up, and wears glasses.
allies_organizations: Various LGBTQ+ advocacy groups, academic institutions.
character_backstory: Aaliyah grew up with a love for books and learning. She pursued higher education and became a scholar, but her passion for social justice led her to become an activist as well. Now, she uses her voice, knowledge, and skills to make a difference.
treasure: A collection of rare books on history and social justice.
1_level_spells: Cure Wounds, Disguise Self, Charm Person, Comprehend Languages
2_level_spells: Calm Emotions, Enhance Ability, Detect Thoughts, Zone of Truth
3_level_spells: Dispel Magic, Tongues, Major Image, Leomund's Tiny Hut
portrait_prompt: A confident black woman named Aaliyah Jones with curly black hair tied up, wearing glasses, and holding a notebook. She stands with determination, ready to champion social justice.

name: Fizzwick Sparkthumb
description: A diminutive gnome with an insatiable curiosity for arcane artifacts. Fizzwick often finds himself in precarious situations due to his obsession with 'borrowing' magical trinkets.
personality_traits: I can't resist taking shiny magical objects, even if they don't belong to me.
ideals: Freedom. Everyone should be free to pursue their own livelihoods.
bonds: I owe a debt I can never repay to the wizard who took me in as an apprentice.
flaws: I can't resist a pretty face.
equipment: Shortsword, Bag of Holding, Thieves' tools, Deck of Illusions
features_traits: Sneak Attack, Mage Hand Legerdemain, Tinkerer
character_appearance: Fizzwick is a spry gnome with twinkling green eyes and a mischievous grin. He usually sports a dapper vest and a hat with a wide feather.
character_backstory: Growing up on the streets, Fizzwick was taken in by a wizard who noticed his knack for arcane matters. However, his kleptomaniac tendencies often got him in trouble.
treasure: A stolen wand that he doesn't know how to use.
1_level_spells: Mage Armor, Disguise Self, Tasha's Hideous Laughter
portrait_prompt: A mischievous gnome named Fizzwick Sparkthumb with a feathered hat, holding a shiny arcane trinket, with a twinkle in his green eyes.
